gawibawibo module¶

gawibawibo.anjuncoding()[source]¶

This function returns index value as int with safe coding Currently, In this 1.0 version, input gayui,bayui,bo as index int number

it will return index value

Args:
  • None
Returns:

return int value. Return code:

0 -- 가위
1 -- 바위
2 -- 보
gawibawibo.check(comp, usr)[source]¶

This function will check who wins int comp and int usr is parameter as gawibawibo index, and each variable format is int; Args:

  • comp (int): Integer computer response
  • usr (int): Integer user response
Returns:

return int value. Return code:

-1 -- Computer Wins
0 -- Draw Game
1 -- User Wins
gawibawibo.choose()[source]¶

This function peeks index for Computer(AI) it will return index value

Args:
  • None
Returns:

return int value. Return code:

0 -- 가위
1 -- 바위
2 -- 보
gawibawibo.start()[source]¶

This function let python start game

Returns:
there is no return value
